address: Xã Ngũ Kiên, Huyện Vĩnh Tường, Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Ngũ Kiên"**

Okay, so I've got this old address: "Xã Ngũ Kiên, Huyện Vĩnh Tường, Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc" and I need to figure out the new administrative unit. My initial strategy is to break this down systematically.

First, I identified the old province: "Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc".  Then, I immediately checked for any resolutions related to province-level changes, particularly something like 60-NQ/TW.  Bingo! I found that "Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc" was actually merged with other provinces to form "Tỉnh Phú Thọ". So, I've got my new province context.

Next, I zeroed in on the old ward, "Xã Ngũ Kiên," within the updated province framework. I knew I'd need to sift through any relevant resolutions specifically concerning "Tỉnh Phú Thọ" and its administrative unit adjustments.  I discarded irrelevant resolutions focused on other provinces.  Then I hit Resolution 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15, the gold mine! This one was all about restructuring within "Tỉnh Phú Thọ".

I carefully scanned the lines.  I was specifically looking for any mention of "Xã Ngũ Kiên."  And there it was!  Line 79 stated that "Xã Ngũ Kiên" was merged with other existing wards, forming the new ward: "Xã Vĩnh Phú."

To confirm, I needed to locate the information about the newly formed "Xã Vĩnh Phú." I found the information in the New Wards section, which included the following JSON-formatted entry: `{"ward_code":"09154","ward_name":"Xã Vĩnh Phú","province_name":"Tỉnh Phú Thọ"}`. This perfectly aligns with my findings.

Given the explicit nature of the resolution directly merging "Xã Ngũ Kiên" into "Xã Vĩnh Phú" within the context of the new province, my confidence in this result is very high. It's a clean, traceable change based on a specific, relevant resolution.

citation.header: 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Phú Thọ
citation.line: 79. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã An Nhân, Vĩnh Thịnh, Ngũ Kiên và Vĩnh Phú thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Vĩnh Phú.
